messages.title: James says:
messages.content: Brecon and Radnorshire is my home. I am very excited at the prospect of standing to be your Member of Parliament.

messages.title: Brecon & Radnorshire — My Home
messages.content: As the Conservative Government forces us to a hard Brexit, I want to make sure that the damage is limited. Powys needs as strong and effective voice standing up for us all in Westminster.
We are delighted and honoured to have the support of our Assembly Member Kirsty Williams and our former MP Roger Williams.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make sure that the damage is limited and provide a strong and effective voice standing up for us all in Westminster.

mentions.candidate: James says: 'Brecon and Radnorshire is my home. I am very excited at the prospect of standing to be your Member of Parliament.'
mentions.tacticalSituation: In Brecon & Radnorshire it's a two-horse-race between James and the Conservative.

issues.brexitEurope: As the Conservative Government forces us to a hard Brexit, I want to make sure that the damage is limited.

community.content: He will work with businesses, farmers and families to make sure we get a fair deal.
His children will attend local schools. He supports the Liberal Democrat policy of putting more money into our health services and limiting the damage from a hard Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: Brecon and Radnorshire is my home. I am very excited at the prospect of standing to be your Member of Parliament.

contactInformation.address: James Gibson-Watt, 4 Watergate, Brecon, Powys, LD3 9AN

endorsements.endorsement: We are delighted and honoured to have the support of our Assembly Member Kirsty Williams and our former MP Roger Williams.

images.caption: James and his three children. Here is James with his family.
James and Adele raised their children in the area. They will attend local schools.
James with business owners, farmers, and families in the constituency.

examples: In Brecon & Radnorshire it's a two-horse-race between James and the Conservative.
Brecon and Radnorshire is my home.
I am very excited at the prospect of standing to be your Member of Parliament.
We are delighted and honoured to have the support of our Assembly Member Kirsty Williams and our former MP Roger Williams.
Make sure that the damage is limited.
Provide a strong and effective voice standing up for us all in Westminster.

He will work with businesses, farmers and families to make sure we get a fair deal.
His children will attend local schools.
James and Adele raised their children in the area.
As the Conservative Government forces us to a hard Brexit, I want to make sure that the damage is limited.
Powys needs as strong and effective voice standing up for us all in Westminster.

The other parties are far behind. They can't win here.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: James and Adele raised their children in the area. He will be a local MP for everyone representing all towns and villages.
